item.title: .rProfile Julia Stewart Lowndes
item.description:
This interview was originally published by rOpenSci on February 9, 2018 as part of the .rprofile series. [This interview occurred at the 2017 rOpenSci unconference]
SK: I’m Sean Kross, I’m the CTO of the Johns Hopkins Data Science Lab. Today I’m interviewing Julia Stewart Lowndes. Julia, what is your current preferred job title? JSL: I’m calling myself a marine data scientist - I’m the Science Program Lead for the Ocean Health Index.
